movie Name.Name: Ek Hasina Thi
movie Name.bio: A woman falls for a charming and mysterious businessman. The whirlwind romance turns sour when she is framed for his underworld crimes. Now, finally out of prison she is ready for sweet revenge.

movie Name.Name: Bhavesh Joshi Superhero
movie Name.bio: The origin story of Bhavesh Joshi, an Indian superhero, who sets out to fulfill his slain friend's wish to clean and reform the country, by training himself to fight and wearing a mask.

movie Name.Name: Hungama
movie Name.bio: The story of a bunch of misfits whose misconception about each others backgrounds end up in a series of chaotic, yet comic outcomes.

movie Name.Name: Lootcase
movie Name.bio: Nandan Kumar comes across a suitcase and discovers it is full of cash. He takes the suitcase and soon finds himself being chased by a notorious gangster, an honest cop and a minister, who want the suitcase at any cost.

movie Name.Name: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
movie Name.bio: A story of a fresh graduate trying to find a balance between the maddening demands of the 'professional' way, and the way of his heart.

movie Name.Name: Rehnaa Hai Terre Dil Mein
movie Name.bio: A young girl is torn between an obsessive lover and a mild-mannered suitor.

movie Name.Name: Jolly LLB
movie Name.bio: Wanting to earn fame and fortune, a small time lawyer files a PIL for an infamous hit-and-run, and thus learns what it really is like to be a lawyer.

movie Name.Name: Madaari
movie Name.bio: When Nirmal loses his family in a disaster caused by government corruption, he embarks on a journey seeking accountability and revenge.

movie Name.Name: The Ghazi Attack
movie Name.bio: A Pakistani submarine, Ghazi plans to secretly attack Vizag port. For doing so, it has to get past Indian submarine S21.

movie Name.Name: Do Dooni Chaar
movie Name.bio: A middle class family in India tries to buy a new car.

movie Name.Name: Ghilli
movie Name.bio: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

movie Name.Name: Karwaan
movie Name.bio: Two friends and a chirpy teenager take a road trip from Bangalore to Kochi.
